<h1 align="center">Shadowlack Core Book ‚òÑÔ∏è</h1>
<p align="center"><b>Shadowlack</b> is a free and imaginary fictional world setting (geofiction) that revolves around the planet Ramath-lehi.</p>
<p align="center">

[![Come chat with us!](https://img.shields.io/matrix/general:shadowlack.com.svg?server_fqdn=matrix.shadowlack.com)](https://matrix.to/#/#general:matrix.shadowlack.com)
[![Donate on OpenCollective](https://img.shields.io/badge/donate-open%20collective-blue.svg?style=popout&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](https://opencollective.com/shadowlack)
[![Become a Patron](https://img.shields.io/badge/donate-patreon-orange.svg?style=popout&logo=patreon)](https://www.patreon.com/shriker)
[![Financial contributors](https://opencollective.com/shadowlack/tiers/badge.svg)](https://opencollective.com/shadowlack)

</p>
</div>
